title: Healing You (Gaoranger OST)
lyrics: tone Kizu tsui ta i nori ga seme giau se kai wo Ma ssugu ni ikiru mono yo Toki ni wa furiaogu ga i i Sora no oo kisa ga tsuchi no nukumori ga Mori no shizuka mizu no kagayaki So *e kusa no yasashisa ga Omae wo iyasu darou massa ra na ano hi he to Oshi mi naku... I'll be heal ing you, hea ling you, fo rever Nodo wo yaku na mida to ita mida su yu uki wo Dai tamama hashiru mono yo Toki ni wa mimi wo sumasu ga i i Sora no hate nasa to tsuchi no natsu kashisa Mori no soyogi Mizu no seseragi So *e kusa no ichizusa ga Omae wo iyasu darou massa ra na ano hi he to Oshi mi naku... I'll be heal ing you, hea ling you, fo rever Watashi wa ooi naru i no chi Omae wo iyasu darou massa ra na ano hi he to Oshi mi naku... I'll be heal ing you, hea ling you, fo rever
